attributes.action: To make it impossible under British law, for people who have been charged with, or are currently under investigation for offences against international human rights law, to partake in any form, the running of a football club, or any other sporting club or organisation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent high profile take-overs of football clubs by investors with well publicised doubts surrounding financial dealings and acts of human rights abuse, has called into question where the heart of the sport now lies.  We are not willing      
to stand back and watch as the positive                  , celebratory and life-affirming aspects   
of football are permanently contaminated  for the sake of more money. This is supposed to be the peoples game and we should now take action, before our game is taken further away from us.
